entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is introduced as the school where the students will be attending. It is described as a place where the students will have their classes, sleep in dormitories, and spend free time in common rooms.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as the teacher who welcomes the students to Hogwarts. She explains the importance of the Sorting ceremony and how the houses will be like families within Hogwarts.

entities.name: griffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts. It has its own noble history and has produced outstanding witches and wizards.
